dmca.title: [EV1-C2439940C] DMCA ISP Notification outsourceamerica.com/SupportSave Solutions Inc
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, January 08, 2007 10:02 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: [EV1-C2439940C] DMCA ISP Notification outsourceamerica.com/SupportSave
Solutions Inc

X-MailFrom: bdavis@netenforcers.com
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net
Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Mon Jan 8 09:53:11 2007
Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with
Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830);
  Mon, 8 Jan 2007 09:53:10 -0600
Return-path: <bdavis@netenforcers.com>
Delivery-date: Mon, 08 Jan 2007 09:53:10 -0600
Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180]
helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com)  by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
bdavis@netenforcers.com)  with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)
 (Exim)
 id 1H3wo9-0000Vj-EE
 for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 08 Jan 2007 09:53:09 -0600
Received: from outbound.mse9.exchange.ms ([69.25.50.217])  by
mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from bdavis@netenforcers.com)  with esmtp (Exim)
 id 1H3wo8-000Aye-0c  for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 08 Jan 2007 09:53:08 -0600
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5
Content-class: urn:content-classes:message
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; 
        charset="iso-8859-1" 
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Subject: RE: [EV1-C2439940C] DMCA ISP Notification outsourceamerica.com/SupportSave
Solutions Inc
Date: Mon, 8 Jan 2007 10:53:04 -0500
Message-ID: <D86F07BB66395C43A311B078855B2B5A01A784B1@ms17.mse9.exchange.ms>
In-Reply-To: <200701052141.l05LfTt4027114@abacus.ev1servers.net>
X-MS-Has-Attach:  
X-MS-TNEF-Correlator:  
Thread-Topic: [EV1-C2439940C] DMCA ISP Notification outsourceamerica.com/SupportSave
Solutions Inc
Thread-Index: AccxdfShTu+Bb9w+S5SgWngth7Q+AwBxucXQ
From: "Barbara Davis" <bdavis@netenforcers.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 08 Jan 2007 15:53:10.0127 (UTC) FILETIME=[188D17F0:01C7333D] 

MIME element (text/plain)
01/05/2007
RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED 
 
Designated Agent
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.  
George Poletes
1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110
Dallas TX 75207 
 
 
Re:        Unauthorized Use of SupportSave Solutions Inc Trademarks and/or Copyrighted
Materials 
Dear Designated Agent: 
This office is authorized to act on behalf of SupportSave Solutions Inc in this
matter. 
This letter is to provide you notice pursuant to 17 U.S.C. § 512 (c)(3)(A) of
unauthorized use of copyrighted material of SupportSave Solutions Inc ("SupportSave
Solutions Inc") (such copyrighted material is referred to as "SupportSave Solutions
Inc Works") by your client,  Outsourceamerica.com at the URL
www.outsourceamerica.com.   SupportSave Solutions Inc has a good faith belief that
use of the Infringing Material by your client is not authorized by SupportSave
Solutions Inc, its agents, or the law.  The information contained in this letter is
accurate, and under the penalty of perjury, Net Enforcers is authorized to act on
behalf of SupportSave Solutions Inc.     
 
The specific works, graphics or other material SupportSave Solutions Inc believes to
be infringed or to be the subject of infringing activity (the "Infringing Material")
are copyrighted images from SupportSave Solutions Inc's website and SupportSave
Solutions Inc's trademark / service mark.  Specific violations of copyrighted images
by www.outsourceamerica.us are listed below this paragraph.     
 
 
http://www.outsourceamerica.us/contactus1.html 
 
Therefore, pursuant to the requirements of 17 U.S.C. § 512(c) (1) (C), SupportSave
Solutions Inc hereby demands that you remove or disable access to the Infringing
Material in an expeditious manner.   
 
If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers Compliance Management Department
via facsimile to 352-505-0040, or via email to
Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com.  All communication must be in writing.  Net
Enforcers is authorized to handle and resolve this matter with you and has already
been involved with this issue.  Calls directly to SupportSave Solutions Inc will not
be accepted.  If your designated agent or representative does not respond to this
demand as requested by 5:00 p.m. on 01/17/2007, we will assume that this demand has
been rejected and will proceed accordingly. 
 
Sincerely,
VCLM Law 
  
Lance C. Venable
Attorney at Law 
 
LCV/roc
